name: Lisa Richichi
text: Every town needs a blaze pizza for sure this place is awesome. They have all different types of pizza crusts three different types of gluten free crusts alone . They have salads and some desserts as well like cookies and brownies. You can ‚Ä¶More

name: Donna Balducci
text: I love love love Blaze Pizza! The options for making your own pizza is endless! Love the thin crust! The staff is so friendly and Justin the manager was extremely accommodating and so nice! Thanks Shane for making me my half white and half margarita just delish! I can't wait to go back! Great service and great pizza!

name: Jada Davis
text: I had a really great experience at this location. The food was great and the management was awesome. Thank you genesis for the great experience and helping me with my order. Very friendly staff.

name: Dave Whitmore
text: This was our first visit and we have just found our new favourite pizza joint! We shared the Veg Out pizza and it was delicious.  So were the dough knots. We will definitely be regulars!

name: Melissa Coniglione
text: This place is so amazing! I am a New York girl and love pizza! The employees are nice and accommodating. You walk in and they greet you with a smile welcoming you to Blaze! The pizza is great! I am a picky eater and was able to customize my ‚Ä¶More

name: Steve Guillen
text: Quick, friendly, and good value for the money with as many toppings as you want for same price!

name: Richard Holst
text: Not what I expected! The food was greasy and cooked very quickly. Tasty and delicious food, the staff is very friendly and attentive. The space is a bit noisy as it‚Äôs ‚Äúindustrial‚Äù design with music piped in. Great selection of toppings and sides. The space is clean and well organized.

name: Lisa Sanchez
text: I ordered online and found that they blew have larger pies. Ordered the pepperoni large and it was only $8.99.  I also ordered the keto pie with the spice red sauce, spinach, cheese, etc with prep and olive oil... Yummy on both!  I love that their meats address nitrate free too.

name: Albert Endler
text: The pizza is super fast if you are in a hurry, crust quality is okay, but not great, they make it to order

name: Steve T
text: I have always been curious as it's around the corner so I decided to stop in and Justin helped me. I got a personal pizza with pepperoni and pineapple and it was quite good. Justin was VERY friendly and I would totally recommend it. My ‚Ä¶More

name: Martin Bordak
text: Love this place. We look for Blaze Pizza where ever we travel.

name: Christie Stratos
text: We ordered two gluten free pizzas online, and the site said it would take 15 to 20 minutes. An hour later we find out they only made one and didn't notice the second one on the order. So they make the second one, but they rush it. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Rio Mondschein
text: Amazing staff! Very welcoming, first time, would definitely go back! Food is the best pizza I have ever tasted. Nancy S. keep up the great work! Overall, Absolutely excellent!

name: Dan McMillan
text: Always good.  Affordable.  Usually not too crowded

name: Jane Slattery
text: Worst experience at a restaurant ever. Every staff member had no idea what was going on. The first person I placed my order with couldn't spell my husband or my name. The second person could figure out how to top our pizzas. He messed them ‚Ä¶More

name: Dria Jean
text: I like to start out with the good first. Enjoyed something simple like their cheesy garlic knots. However when I went there were no napkins, no lids for the cups and no pepper and nor was I  told this prior to purchasing a drink. Could be good however management needs to be more inventory attentive.

name: Bianca S
text: Got: pizza 2 toppings, spicy red sauce, goat cheese, broccoli, grilled chicken, finished with arugula and pesto sauce. Crispy thin, lots of flavor. Inside looks like Chipotle and plays fun music. Also, I get a free dessert for the review. :-)

name: Naveen Thota
text: Nice place and fresh pizza pie.

name: NJ219bands
text: Low carb pizza is great.

name: danielle m
text: Had a really great first visit tonight! I was really happy to see vegan dough, cheese and meat options! Thank you, it's not easy to come by in most pizza places. ‚Ä¶More

name: Bae C
text: Build your own or just order from the menu, it's still the same cost. Size of the pie is what's the difference between prices. Center of the dough of the pie in usually raw. Bring it "to go" and heat it some more in the oven to cook the ‚Ä¶More

name: Erik Cohen
text: Excellent pizza. Make your own with some interesting toppings. The dessert - the s'mores was such an amazing idea. They heat it using the oven for the pizza. It's fantastic.

name: Robert Czarneski
text: Did not expect the keto pizza crust to be that good.

name: Mike O'Connell
text: Very clean, friendly staff, and food is good.

name: Michelle Moran
text: Pizza was great. The place is so creative and very affordable. The customer service is great especially their employee, Julia.

name: Jesse Tjarks
text: Absolutely amazing here, clean and incredible customer service! I will absolutely return! Food was hot and fresh, they use high quality ingredients! Nancy and Eve are the best made us feel like family, my brother and I will tell everyone about this place!

name: Desiree B
text: Awesome pizza! There are a bunch of different choices for toppings!

name: Diana Urgo
text: First time visiting this establishment very important great polite fast service from staff.  Clean, great prices and great pizza. I was very happy they also had  vegan choices.  I will definitely return üëçüèªüòä

name: Nikki Hynes
text: Cool new option for a quick bite. Dough knots were a nice change of pace from standard garlic knots. Being able to customize your pizza is always nice. S‚Äômores pie, heated is an amazing treat too!

name: April Fraley
text: Pizza is so good! Love the way this place is setup. Pizza is made to order kind of like if u were at Chipotle! U pick everything from the crust to the toppings. They have a spicy marinara that is to die for! Once they build ur pizza they throw it in the oven and bake it on an open flame! Def recommend!!

name: Jared Skidmore
text: Great ingredients, fantastic drinks (you gotta try the agua fresca). Only downsides are that it is a bit messy, quite pricey, and they can never cut the pizzas into equal slices. I always get 4 tiny slices and 2 massive slices. Besides that, really solid restaurant.

name: Corey Chee
text: In blazers pizza there is a variety of choices in each section of a pizza. Each topping taste delicious and the service here is amazing. The workers here are all friendly and delightful.

name: Dreaming Cars
text: I just want to thank the staff of Blaze pizza, they were terrific! They were very accommodating and patient. My brother had a small graduation gathering after his graduation and we all had a great time! Although, it was about 20 people, you ‚Ä¶More

name: Danielle Ternyila
text: I tried the cauliflower crust pizza and it was to die for! Such great pizza, such great staff. Can't wait to go back!!!!

name: Yin Ming
text: This is a great restaurant! I came in and was greeted by Joe who did an amazing job making my pizza and then it was served to me by Justin who was very polite. The employees really keep the atmosphere upbeat and the pizza quality is amazing!

name: Andrew DeServio
text: Excellent food and amazing service, especially from my girl Nancy. She made the experience almost as awesome as the pizza is. üôåüôåüôå

name: Carlton Wright
text: Blaze pizza is the perfect place to satisfy all  of my pizza cravings! They offer so many different options with crusts and toppings, you can't go wrong! The staff are really helpful and provide excellent customer service! Shout out to Justin, Judi, and Ang for being amazing everytime I visit!

name: Eileen DeServio
text: Excellent pizza‚Äôs! Build your own or signature pizza. All ingredients are fresh, pizza is delicious  and the customer service is great!

name: Lauren Heitner
text: I never write reviews but beyond the tasty food, the STAFF is amazing! They are helpful and you can see many take pride in their work there. Definitely recommend it!

name: marcel london
text: Well-rounded pizza place. They even have options for vegetarians and vegans. Even a gluten-free crust. They will even change their gloves if you have severe allergies to certain items. It reminds me of a Subway sandwich place, the way you go through and pick each topping. Very custom, and the price is good too.

name: Eric leshin
text: I go there often, as I work nearby. The Pizza is delicious! I love having it made right in front of me. The customer service is also top notch. I highly recommend.

name: Eve Thayer
text: Best pizza I've ever had in my life it's amazing and tastes so good. Joe is the best worker there always puts a smile on my face. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Mohammed S. Nabi
text:
Like the idea of make your own... the base could have been  cooked a bit more.
Pizza tastes pretty flavorful.

name: Jeremy Skillings
text: Nancy was wonderful. Loved our experience. My nephew said he wants to eat here every time he visits. Very friendly service. Great food + unique and tasty lemonades.

name: Josephine Sclafani
text: My first time at Blaze pizza. I recently had the pleasure of meeting Nancy, Justin and Justin. I cannot tell you how nice and how helpful they were! Very happy and will most definitely will be returning. The food was great but the three ‚Ä¶More

text: My family convinced me to try Blaze pizza.  Being from NY, I miss the thin crust pizzas. This pizza was delicious. Thin crust just how we like it. Nancy took great care of us. We certainly will be back. Rt 9S Manalapan.

name: Patricia Grace
text: Loved the customized pizza at an affordable price. The Garlic Knots were out of this world! The staff was friendly and efficient.

name: josielynn colonna
text: The pizza gets better everytime. ‚ù§üçïüçïüçï

name: Charles Hirshberg

text: Amazing experience. Went to Manalapan Location and met some great staff who briefed us well with how to make fancy pizza with all the best variety of stuff they‚Äôve got. Thanks Nancy, Laz and Mike H. You guys made our experience totally memorable. Definitely coming back. üòÄ

text: Justin & Syd made the best pizzas we‚Äôve ever had here! I had to get their names so I could thank them personally. They both provided excellent customer service and our pizzas were wonderful. Will definitely be back!!

text: I love blaze!  I always get a build your own pizza, they have great toppings and it's affordable.  Also, the seasonal juice options are delicious.  The environment is chill, the employees are super nice, and the restaurant is always clean.

name: Wendy Bird
text: Delicious customizable pizza! Ready very quickly. My literally only complaint was that everyone in the place except the guy working the ovens was talking really quietly so it was hard to hear their questions.

name: Nick Palmisani
text: The best customer service and amazing pizza for a great price. I love that I can customize any pie to my liking with such a wide variety of quality toppings.

text: I honestly don't get blaze pizza.  It's the chipotle of pizza.  But here's the thing:  This is new jersey.  There's real pizza shops that are quicker and better within blocks of the location.

name: Preston Cohen

text: Great location! Clean, fast service, and staff are super friendly and helpful. Definitely my favorite place to go!

Consistently good from store to store and my wife says "it's the best she ever had."

name: Kylie Shea

name: MrsG MrsR
text: Service is outstanding.  Vegan options are a big plus for me. Always ask for the sauce  on  the other side :) Dough options are good, I prefer the regular thin crust.  The 30 minute drive is worth it for me.

name: Prashant Amin

name: Munish Kohli
text: My son suggested to have dinner at this place in manalapan on route 9. Mike H and Laz made our pizzas with absolute courtesy,  care and perfection. Nancy at the billing counter was very sweet, helpful and courteous. Not just pizza was great, but all 3 working there were just lovely people.

name: Nadgely Urbina
